text: Agrarian Trade Union Federation (in Spanish: Federación Sindical Agraria) was a national-syndicalist trade union in Spain, founded in 1933 in Castile. The federation was linked to the Juntas de Ofensiva Nacional-Sindicalista. ==Sources== * La Organización Sindical Española, Escuela Sindical 1961. 1961: Madrid, page 33. Category:Trade unions in Spain Category:National syndicalism Category:Fascist trade unions Category:Trade unions established in 1933
title: Agrarian Trade Union Federation
